home.text_base_description: * * Transparent Pricing * * On the cusp of Mission Dolores and Duboce Triangle, in the heart of the Mission, this b'ful, light-filled, 2BD/2BA condo has it all! 99 WalkScore, 100 BikeScore, and 88 TransitScore, get easily to anywhere you want to go. Uninterrupted open living, dining and kitchen space punctuated by a wall of windows. This 4th floor condo exudes warmth and natural light and offers amazing downtown views. Enjoy baseball fireworks from Oracle Park right in your living room! Rich wood floors. Sleek kitchen w Caesarstone counters and top line stainless appliances. 2 spacious BDRs w custom built closets, and 2 full, tiled BAs. Principal BA is en suite. In-unit washer and dryer. Lounge on the communal rooftop deck w BBQ & panoramic city views in the city's warmest weather. Elevator bldg w beautiful lobby, bike storage, and community rm. Deeded parking and storage. Walk to Rainbow, Whole Foods, world class restaurants, BART, MUNI, tech shuttles. Seconds to 101/280. Wow
